snippet.title: The First Explorers - First Look Trailer | Settlers-like RTS/Citybuilder
snippet.description:
► Wishlist now on Steam! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2544820/The_First_Explorers/
► Support me on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/user?u=102693809

► Website: https://the-first-explorers.com/
► Discord: https://discord.gg/NPNtT6Wmj2
► Twitter: https://twitter.com/First_Explorers
► Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/TheFirstExplorers/

The First Explorers is a Settlers-like game, that offers the perfect mix of organic city-building and RTS in a bustling world. Set in the time of antiquity in Europe, you will play as the Romans, Carthaginians or Gauls. Are you ready to raise an army backed by a thriving economy?

Hi! 
My name is Sebastian. 
For around 1 year I've been developing a Settlers-like game called The First Explorers.
If you like this first look on my game, I'd be happy if you would check out the steam page and join the official discord! 
On that discord I'm sharing regular development updates with the community and I'm always open for your feedback and ideas.

Looking forward to meet you!

All the best,
Sebastian
